TopicTitle: KSP 1.3 with plenty of mods crash during startup

Articles.Content:
I've just updated to 1.3 and the game crashes during load. Here's the mod list

 

KSP: 1.3 (Win64) - Unity: 5.4.0p4 - OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0) 64bit
000_AT_Utils - 1.4.2
Filter Extensions - 2.8.1.2
Toolbar - 1.7.13
USI Tools - 0.8.18
Ambient Light Adjustment - 2.6.1.6
Astrogator - 0.6.2
AutoAsparagus - 2.2.5
B9 Part Switch - 1.7.1
BD Animation Modules - 0.6.4.2
BetterTimeWarpContinued - 2.3.7.4
Bon Voyage - 0.12
Chatterer - 0.9.92.1622

ManeuverNodeSplitter - 1.6

PartCommanderContinued - 0.1.1
Precise Node - 1.2.4
Procedural Wings - 0.12
Procedural Parts - 1.2.8
QuizTechAeroPackContinued - 1.3.8
RCS Build Aid - 0.9.1
Sigma Binary - 1.6.1

Freight Transport Tech - 0.6.8
EVAParachutesAndEjectionSeats - 0.1.10.1
KSP Interstellar Extended - 1.13.9
Waypoint Manager - 2.6.2
[x] Science! - 5.6

 

And a zip file with the error log and the stuff created during the crash

https://www.dropbox.com/s/bc2tuj8i2jf27fu/2017-05-25_193434.7z?dl=0

Most if not all of this mods will need to be updated

Give the mod authors some time to do their work

Edited May 25, 2017 by linuxgurugamer
I counted at least 8 mod which I maintain.  I haven't even started yet, it's going to take some time

All,

New to this game, how long does it usually take to get updated mods?  I have been using engineering redux and [x] science, is there someplace to watch where the modders give updates?

Thx
jonpfl
There is a reason mods they work with a certain version of KSP.  You should not assume that just because it works with an old version it will work with the new version.
The only mod that I am using is "Kerbal Engineer Redux - 1.1.2.8" and I am crashing at startup as well.

2 minutes ago, jonpfl said:

New to this game, how long does it usually take to get updated mods?  I have been using engineering redux and [x] science, is there someplace to watch where the modders give updates?

It varies depending on the mod author.

3 minutes ago, Nergal8617 said:

It varies depending on the mod author.

I don't think I can go back to not having engineering redux!!  I will probably go do training missions.

Thx

jonpfl

23 minutes ago, jonpfl said:

All,

New to this game, how long does it usually take to get updated mods?  I have been using engineering redux and [x] science, is there someplace to watch where the modders give updates?

Thx
jonpfl

Watch the forum thread for the mod, and don't keep asking when it will be ready.

1 hour ago, linuxgurugamer said:

 

Most if not all of this mods will need to be updated

Give the mod authors some time to do their work

I know, I just hoped the log files woud provide some sort of clue about what's broken so mod authors get to know where to look

2 hours ago, juanml82 said:

I know, I just hoped the log files woud provide some sort of clue about what's broken so mod authors get to know where to look

You are wasting our time.  We know things won't work.  Internals of the game changed, the logs you have are totally meaningless.

Please wait until you have updated mods to test with
ah thanks for the info Linux, i was assuming our 1.3 output logs with 1.2 mods would be helpful but ill save "our" time instead, i guess you guys know where the issues will be then?
Argh, I look into the properties of KSP on Steam, look into betas, and find, though there is 1.2.9 and 1.0.5, there isn't any one for 1.2.2!
Which Module_Manager version do you have?
